LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawExiting.stages.0.label: Spitting prey out of tailmaw
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawExiting.stages.0.descri: Dinner's coming back up... At least it's not out my main mouth.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawExiting.stages.1.label: Spitting multiple prey out of tailmaw
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPassing.stages.0.label: Swallowing prey with tail
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPassing.stages.1.label: Swallowing several prey with tail
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPleasuring.stages.0.des: It may not be a true mouth, but it can still explore all your private places!~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailmawPleasuring.stages.1.des: Two at once? All the tastier.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatPassing.stages.0.des: Something to grind on while I wait for you to go down...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatPassing.stages.1.des: Any more and I might have to start dragging my tail on the ground...~
How close can I pull you to my stomach without taking you all the way in?~
I can barely keep my tail straight with all this rocking around!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatStoring.stages.1.des: Look at that--my tail has an elbow now!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatStoring.stages.2.des: I can't even curl my tail anymore!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTailThroatStoring.stages.3.des: I could knock a building over with my tail!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTesticlesConvertingChemfuel.st: There's that groovy burn in my balls!
This is way better than milking boomalopes all day!
Maybe I should get some fire and put on a show...~
Now which generator should I fuck first?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTesticlesDissolvingChemfuel.st: What's the matter? Can't stay upright in there?
Dissolving two live prey into chem-cum
Keep thrashing. It's way too slick in there to climb even an inch.
Dissolving three live prey into chem-cum
You're all more useful this way, I promise!
Dissolving several live prey into chem-cum
Was that a lighter? Cute. It's too wet in there to light me up.~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInTesticlesMushingChemfuel.stage: Breaking down two prey into chem-cum
Breaking down three prey into chem-cum
Oh, my loins are heating up now!
Breaking down several prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingChemfuel.stages: Is this gentle burn what boomalopes feel? It's like they slurped down some mild peppers...
Hell--oh hell! This has to be way better than being a boomalope!
Oh, baby, I'm burning so good! This oughta keep the generators burning for weeks!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.0.d: There's that gentle tingle I love...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.1.d: Mmh, I can't wait to have a taste!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.2.d: I bet cows are envious of me!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderConvertingMilk.stages.3.d: I'll have enough to feed the colony for days... Or just myself.~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingChemfuel.stages: Pretty slippery in there, isn't it? Can't keep upright?
Dissolving two live prey into chem-milk
Don't worry, you two won't slide out.
Dissolving three live prey into chem-milk
Starting to get tight enough y'all don't slide around.
Dissolving several live prey into chem-milk
Think how much more valuable you'll all be as oil!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.0.d: Ever wanted to nurture something to the fullest?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.1.l: Dissolving two live prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.1.d: You two'll just be milk flowing from my taps here soon.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.2.l: Dissolving three live prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.2.d: You think I can't handle a little thrashing in my dugs?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.3.l: Dissolving several live prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderDissolvingMilk.stages.3.d: I hope we can drink all of y'all before you spoil!
Stopped trying to fight the slickness already?
Breaking down two prey into chem-milk
Jellified already? Just gotta thin you down, then.
Breaking down three prey into chem-milk
Starting to feel a bit of that gentle burn now...
Breaking down several prey into chem-milk
Oh yeah, here comes the burn, real soon!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.1.labe: Breaking down two prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.2.labe: Breaking down three prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.2.desc: Looks like my milkbag's rounding out...
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.3.labe: Breaking down several prey into milk
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderMushingMilk.stages.3.desc: I can already feel that familiar tingle!

LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.0.label: Prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.0.descript: My udder's laden. I'd be unbalanced if they were in my tits!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.1.label: Two prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.1.descript: I'm not even close to having all my teats plugged!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.2.label: Three prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.3.label: Several prey stored in udder
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderStoring.stages.3.descript: Is that all of my teats plugged up now? Eh, might as well make sure.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.0.label: Warming up udder for prey
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.0.descript: Oh, the plans I have for you!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.1.label: Warming up udder for multiple prey
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderWarming.stages.1.descript: Oh, the plans I have for you!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleAmalgamating.stages: You're gonna make my teats so big and firm!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleAssimilating.stages: Anyone else wanna give 'em a tweak?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleContacting.stages.0: Who says I can't play with my teat-puffers before I absorb them?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleContacting.stages.1: That's it! More than one sucker--er, suckler: that's what udders are for!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleDumping.stages.2.de: I don't know if I'll ever stop leaking after this...
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNippleExiting.stages.2.de: I don't know if I'll ever stop leaking after this...
Loosening up to absorb prey into teat
The milk's coming; just keep sucking!
Loosening up to absorb multiple prey into teats
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNipplePleasuring.stages.1: I only have so many hands! I can't keep up!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNipplePurging.stages.1.la: Pressing multiple remains out of teats
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInUdderNipplePurging.stages.1.de: I might actually start lactating for real if I keep this up...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAmalgamating.stages.0.de: Puffier, tighter... and so much more sensitive.~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAmalgamating.stages.2.de: One on the left, one on the right, one on the buzzer.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAmalgamating.stages.3.de: How many more can I line my box with?~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAssimilating.stages.2.de: One on the left, one on the right, one on the buzzer.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaAssimilating.stages.3.de: I'm *drooling* at the thought of more...~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaContacting.stages.0.desc: Who says I can't play with my pussy-puffers before I absorb them?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaContacting.stages.1.desc: Everyone's thirsty for my nectar, huh?
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaLoosening.stages.0.label: Loosening up to absorb prey into labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaLoosening.stages.1.label: Loosening up to absorb multiple prey into labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaLoosening.stages.1.descr: There's enough flower for everyone to feast; keep at it!~
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaPurging.stages.0.label: Fingering remains out of labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaPurging.stages.1.label: Fingering multiple remains out of labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaPurging.stages.1.descrip: I honestly might as well just start jilling at this point.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaReshaping.stages.0.label: Reshaping prey from labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaReshaping.stages.1.label: Reshaping multiple prey from labia
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInVaginaReshaping.stages.1.descr: I don't wanna be loose again!
Is this the true meaning of "burn, baby, burn"?
My belly's got that half-full jerrycan "glunk" to it.
I'm leaving puddles of fuel everywhere I go...
I'm leaking more fuel than a shot-up generator!
So what kind of machine do you think you'll power?
Dissolving two live prey into chem-cum
I bet boomalopes don't have this much fun!
Dissolving three live prey into chem-cum
I'm gonna need a barrel for all of you...
Dissolving several live prey into chem-cum
We'll never run out of chemfuel at this rate!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.1.l: Breaking down two prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.1.d: Just gotta refine you two down, now!
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.2.l: Breaking down three prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.2.d: Oh my, there's that spicy tingle.
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.3.l: Breaking down several prey into chem-cum
LanguageData.RV2_PreyInWombMushingChemfuel.stages.3.d: That burning... as though I were a boomalope in heat...~
